To  Matthew Jackson
From  Oliver Mummery
Subject  Thanks ______________________________________________________________________________ Hi Matt Thanks for your help with the film festival. I’m really sorry that I called you at the weekend but there were some problems with our team in Venice. Sally Decker was ill and that’s why we needed you to work on Saturday and Sunday. Please send me an invoice for your work and I’ll pay it as soon as I can. Thanks once again. I really appreciate all your hard work. Best wishes Ollie
